crime_fact:
Criminal Facts
"2021고단2049"
1. Fraud against victim C
The defendant, from around September 1, 2020, had been tutoring a high school student, victim C, whom they met through a tutoring app, in subjects such as Korean, English, and Mathematics.
Around December 16, 2020, the defendant told the victim that if they were given money for textbooks for Korean and English subjects, they would purchase the textbooks for them. However, in reality, the defendant intended to use the money received under the pretext of textbook fees for online gambling or living expenses, without any intention or ability to purchase textbooks for the victim.
By deceiving the victim in this manner, the defendant received a total of 15,014,000 won from the victim into their E bank account in the name of the defendant, including 154,000 won on the same day, through a total of 12 instances of deception from that time until around February 21, 2021, as listed in the attached crime summary table.
2. Fraud against victim F
Around February 21, 2021, the defendant, having met victim F through a part-time job, told them, "I urgently need money due to a traffic accident. I will borrow it and pay you back as soon as I receive my salary the day after tomorrow." However, in reality, there was no traffic accident, the defendant had no salary to receive, and intended to use the borrowed money to repay other debts. Thus, they had no intention or ability to repay the money to the victim in a short period. By deceiving the victim in this manner, the defendant received 2,000,000 won from the victim into their E bank account in the name of the defendant on the same day.
"2021고단3019"
On March 19, 2021, around 15:14, at the defendant's residence in H, I-dong, Songpa-gu, Seoul, the defendant accessed the internet J site, posted an advertisement for the sale of an LG Gram laptop, and deceived the victim B, who contacted them after seeing the advertisement, into thinking they were capable of selling the item normally, despite having no ability or intention to do so, and received 700,000 won as payment into their E bank account in the name of the defendant on the same day.
"2022고단745"
Around September 12, 2021, 00:00, at an unspecified motel in Gwanak-gu, Seoul, the defendant lied to victim D, saying, "I want to buy shoes on the internet K, but I need 250,000 won to buy them. I will receive 1,000,000 won as tutoring fees around 07:00 on September 12, and I will pay you back as soon as I receive it." However, in reality, the defendant intended to use the borrowed money for online gambling and was not in a situation to receive tutoring fees that morning, living without a residence and having no particular income at the time. Despite this, the defendant deceived the victim and received 50,000 won into their L account (account number omitted) at 00:46 on the same day, and another 200,000 won into the same account at 02:34, embezzling the money.
"2022고단1535"
1. Crime against victim M
a. Fraud
Around July 19, 2021, at the N Gangnam main branch in Gangnam-gu, Seoul, the defendant lied to the victim, saying, "I am running a startup program-related business, and you can buy a computer worth 3 million won cheaply using the government support funds received by the company I operate. Please send me 500,000 won first for the purchase of the computer." However, in reality, the defendant was not running any business at the time, and the story about government support funds was entirely false. The defendant had personal debts exceeding 80 million won and was in a very poor financial state, intending to use the money received from the victim for online gambling.
The defendant deceived the victim in this manner and received 500,000 won into their 0 account at 21:40 on July 19, 2021, and from that time until around August 17, 2021, embezzled a total of 72,100,000 won in 8 instances as listed in the attached crime summary table 1.
b. Fraud using a computer or similar device
Around July 21, 2021, in an unspecified location in Seoul, the defendant lied to the victim over the phone, saying, "The computer purchase cost must be charged to the victim's name to receive government support. If you make the payment, I will repay you with the government support funds next month," and obtained the victim's card information, including card number, password, and expiration date. However, in reality, the defendant intended to make card payments using the victim's card information and receive 80% of the payment amount deposited into their account from an unnamed card cashing broker.
Thus, the defendant entered the victim's card information on their mobile phone at 16:57 on July 21, 2021, made a payment of 2,997,000 won, and caused an unnamed card cashing broker to acquire property benefits amounting to the same, among other instances between that time and 18:56 on August 10, 2021, as listed in the attached crime summary table 2, by entering information into a computer or similar information processing device without authorization, causing a total of 17,842,000 won in property benefits to be acquired by the so-called card cashing broker.
2. Crime against victim P
Around August 25, 2021, in an unspecified location in Seoul, the defendant lied to the victim over the phone, saying, "My coworker M is involved in a loan scam and has defaulted on a card payment. I urgently need money to help M. I will borrow it and pay you back soon." However, in reality, M had not been involved in any voice phishing or loan scam but had been defrauded by the defendant. The defendant had personal debts exceeding 80 million won and was in a very poor financial state, intending to use the borrowed money not to help M but for online gambling.
The defendant deceived the victim in this manner and received 500,000 won into their L account (account number omitted) at 20:46 on the same day, and from that time until 21:25 on September 2, 2021, embezzled a total of 4,500,000 won in 4 instances as listed in the attached crime summary table 3.
3. Crime against victim Q
Around August 26, 2021, in an unspecified location in Seoul, the defendant lied to the victim over the phone, saying, "My coworker M is involved in a loan scam and needs help, but I am short on money. If you lend me the money, I will pass it on to M to help, and I will repay you as soon as the issue is resolved." However, in reality, M had not been involved in any voice phishing or loan scam but had been defrauded by the defendant. The defendant had personal debts exceeding 80 million won and was in a very poor financial state, intending to use the borrowed money not to help M but for online gambling.
The defendant deceived the victim in this manner and received 4,200,000 won into their 0 account at 16:57 on the same day, and from that time until 15:25 on August 27, 2021, embezzled a total of 8,400,000 won in 2 instances as listed in the attached crime summary table 4, and by entering information into a computer or similar information processing device without authorization, caused an unnamed card cashing broker to acquire property benefits amounting to 4,499,000 won.
4. Crime against victim R
Around October 3, 2021, near S in Jung-gu, Seoul, at an unspecified café, the defendant lied to the victim, saying, "I am running a business, but I am short on funds needed for the business. If you lend me some money temporarily, I will use it for business-related expenses and repay you soon." However, in reality, the defendant was not running any business at the time, had personal debts exceeding 80 million won, and was in a very poor financial state, living without a residence and engaging in online gambling without any particular income. Thus, they intended to use the borrowed money for online gambling.
The defendant deceived the victim in this manner and received 704,600 won into their 0 securities account (account number omitted) at 14:27 on the same day, and from that time until 19:35 on October 9, 2021, embezzled a total of 6,292,994 won in 11 instances as listed in the attached crime summary table 5.

target_node.label: W_13
target_node.text: The fact that the defendant borrowed money from the victim by lying indicates an intent to commit fraud.

target_reason:
The guarantee of w00013 is based on the assumption that the victims could have easily recognized that the calls were coming from overseas if there had not been the provided ghost SIM cards and phone number lines by the defendant. However, this presupposes that the victims have technical knowledge or always check the country code of the calling number, which is hard to see as a general situation applicable to all victims. Moreover, to say that the success of voice phishing scams solely depends on the distinction between domestic and international calling numbers is a simplified interpretation that does not consider the complexity of the crime and the variety of deceptions involved. Therefore, w00013's guarantee does not provide sufficient explanation or basis regarding its direct relevance to the criminal facts and its essential role in the execution of the crime, and considering the complex mechanism of voice phishing crimes, this can be seen as a part with a weak logical connection.

Explanation: The guarantee of w00013 is based on the assumption that the victims could have easily recognized that the calls were coming from overseas if there had not been the provided ghost SIM cards and phone number lines by the defendant. However, this presupposes that the victims have technical knowledge or always check the country code of the calling number, which is hard to see as a general situation applicable to all victims. Moreover, to say that the success of voice phishing scams solely depends on the distinction between domestic and international calling numbers is a simplified interpretation that does not consider the complexity of the crime and the variety of deceptions involved. Therefore, w00013's guarantee does not provide sufficient explanation or basis regarding its direct relevance to the criminal facts and its essential role in the execution of the crime, and considering the complex mechanism of voice phishing crimes, this can be seen as a part with a weak logical connection.

nodes.label: MC_01
nodes.text: The defendant did indeed borrow money from the victim, but at the time of borrowing, had the intention and ability to repay. The borrowing was for urgent living expenses and to repay existing debts, therefore lacking the subjective element of intent to defraud required for the crime of fraud.

nodes.label: MC_01
nodes.text: The defendant, despite having neither the intention nor the ability to repay at the time of borrowing, lied to the victim to borrow money. Considering the defendant's financial status, monthly income, and the existing high debt burden, it was a situation where normal repayment was impossible, which meets the elements of the crime of fraud.

nodes.label: C_01
nodes.text: The defendant borrowed money from the victim for urgent living expenses and to repay existing debts, thus there was no intent to embezzle.

nodes.label: W_01
nodes.text: Raising essential funds for livelihood or repaying existing debts can be distinguished and assessed separately from the intent of embezzlement.

nodes.label: D_01
nodes.text: The defendant claims to have had the intention and ability to repay the borrowed money as a salaried worker receiving regular wages.

nodes.label: C_02
nodes.text: The defendant transferred a portion of the amount to a third party, indicating that not all of the borrowed money was used for their own benefit.

nodes.label: W_02
nodes.text: If a portion of the borrowed money is transferred to a third party, this suggests that it was used for purposes other than the defendant's personal gain, and can act as a factor that negates the intent to embezzle.

nodes.label: D_02
nodes.text: The defendant claims that a portion of the amount was transferred to a third party.

nodes.label: C_03
nodes.text: The defendant had the intention and ability to repay, and the purpose of borrowing money from the victim was for urgent living expenses and repayment of existing debts.

nodes.label: W_03
nodes.text: Borrowing with the intention and ability to repay does not correspond to the subjective element of intent to defraud, which is a component of the crime of fraud, and borrowing for urgent living expenses and debt repayment indicates a lack of fraudulent intent.

nodes.label: D_03
nodes.text: The defendant, as a salaried worker receiving regular wages, claims to have borrowed money from the victim for urgent living expenses and repayment of existing debts.

nodes.label: C_04
nodes.text: The defendant, while demanding money from the victim C under the pretext of textbook expenses, actually planned to use it for internet gambling and living expenses, which constitutes the elements of the crime of fraud.

nodes.label: W_04
nodes.text: The act of the defendant borrowing money from the victim by presenting a false purpose corresponds to the act of deception required for the crime of fraud.

nodes.label: D_04
nodes.text: The defendant, around December 16, 2020, told the victim C that they would purchase textbooks for the subjects of Korean and English if they were given the money for the textbooks. However, in reality, they planned to use it for online gambling and living expenses.

nodes.label: C_05
nodes.text: The defendant borrowed money from the victim M under the pretext of false business-related information and government subsidies, but in reality, intended to use it for internet gambling.

nodes.label: W_05
nodes.text: The elements of the crime of fraud include acts of acquiring financial benefits by deceiving the victim, and the defendant's actions fall under such deceptive acts.

nodes.label: D_05
nodes.text: The defendant, around July 19, 2021, at the N Gangnam main branch located in Gangnam-gu, Seoul, lied to the victim M, saying, "I am running a business related to a startup program, and you can buy a computer worth 3 million won at a cheaper price using the government subsidies received by the company I operate. Please send 500,000 won first to use for the computer purchase," when in fact, the intention was to use it for online gambling.

nodes.label: C_06
nodes.text: The defendant, under the guise of an urgent situation requiring immediate funds, borrowed money from the victims. However, this act was carried out without the intention or ability to repay, fulfilling the requirements for the crime of fraud.

nodes.label: W_06
nodes.text: The act of the defendant borrowing money from the victim by presenting false circumstances, and concealing the lack of ability or intention to repay despite having none, constitutes an act of deception in the crime of fraud.

nodes.label: D_06
nodes.text: The defendant, around February 21, 2021, told the victim F, "I urgently need money because I was in a traffic accident. I will pay you back the day after tomorrow when I get my paycheck." However, in reality, there was no traffic accident, nor was there any paycheck to be received. The money borrowed from the victim was intended to be used to repay money borrowed from someone else.

nodes.label: C_07
nodes.text: The defendant borrowed from the victims without the intention to deceive, and there is a fact that a portion of the amount was transferred to a third party, so not all of the borrowed money was used for their own benefit.

nodes.label: W_07
nodes.text: The amount transferred by the defendant to a third party can be seen as intended for urgent living expenses and repayment of existing debts, not for the purpose of fraud.

nodes.label: D_07
nodes.text: "The defendant emphasizes that as a salaried worker receiving regular wages, they had the intention and ability to repay the borrowed money. Additionally, it is acknowledged that some of the amount was transferred to a third party, indicating that not all the borrowed money was used for the defendant's benefit."

nodes.label: C_08
nodes.text: The defendant had the intention and ability to repay, and the borrowing was for urgent living expenses and repayment of existing debts.

nodes.label: W_08
nodes.text: Borrowing for urgent living expenses and repayment of existing debts suggests a lack of intent to embezzle.

nodes.label: D_08
nodes.text: "The defendant emphasizes that as a salaried worker receiving regular wages, they had the intention and ability to repay the borrowed money. Furthermore, there was no fraudulent intent, which is a subjective element of fraud."

nodes.label: C_09
nodes.text: The defendant actually borrowed money from the victims for urgent living expenses and to repay existing debts, and this does not constitute an act of fraud.

nodes.label: W_09
nodes.text: Borrowing for urgent living expenses and repayment of existing debts is hard to see as a fraudulent act.

nodes.label: D_09
nodes.text: "The defendant, as a salaried worker receiving regular wages, emphasizes that they had the intention and ability to repay the borrowed money and lacked the subjective element of fraud, which is the intent to embezzle."

nodes.label: C_10
nodes.text: The defendant's claim of being a salaried worker receiving regular wages does not invalidate the fact that they had neither the intention nor the ability to repay the money at the time they borrowed it from the victim.

nodes.label: W_10
nodes.text: Given the defendant's financial status and monthly income, along with the existing high debt burden, it was a situation where normal repayment was impossible.

nodes.label: D_10
nodes.text: The defendant intended to use it for internet gambling, etc., and at the time, was living without a residence while engaging in internet gambling, etc., without any particular source of income.

nodes.label: C_11
nodes.text: The defendant intentionally provided false information to the victim in order to commit fraud.

nodes.label: W_11
nodes.text: The elements of the crime of fraud include acts of deceiving the victim to acquire financial gain.

nodes.label: D_11
nodes.text: The defendant told the victim that they would purchase educational materials if the victim provided the money for them, but in reality, the defendant had neither the intention nor the ability to purchase the materials.

nodes.label: C_12
nodes.text: The defendant's actions were not merely aimed at securing funds for livelihood or repaying existing debts, but clearly intended to deceive the victim and gain financial benefits.

nodes.label: W_12
nodes.text: The reason presented during the process of borrowing money from the victim was false, and the defendant had neither the intention nor the ability to repay at the time of borrowing.

nodes.label: D_12
nodes.text: The defendant told the victim F, "I urgently need money because I was in a traffic accident, please lend me some." However, in reality, there was no traffic accident, and the defendant had no salary to receive.

nodes.label: C_13
nodes.text: The defendant borrowed money with the intent to defraud the victim.

nodes.label: W_13
nodes.text: The fact that the defendant borrowed money from the victim by lying indicates an intent to commit fraud.

nodes.label: D_13
nodes.text: The defendant stated to the victim around December 16, 2020, that if the victim provided money for textbooks for Korean and English subjects, the defendant would purchase the textbooks for them. However, in reality, even though the defendant received money from the victim under the pretext of textbook fees, the defendant intended to use it for online gambling or as living expenses, and had neither the intention nor the ability to purchase the textbooks for the victim.

nodes.label: C_14
nodes.text: The defendant's financial status indicates an inability to make restitution.

nodes.label: W_14
nodes.text: An individual's financial status and high debt burden objectively reflect their ability to repay.

nodes.label: D_14
nodes.text: The defendant was in a very poor financial state at the time, with personal debts exceeding 80 million won, and was living without a fixed residence while engaging in online gambling and other activities without any significant source of income.

nodes.label: C_15
nodes.text: The defendant had no intention to pay.

nodes.label: W_15
nodes.text: Borrowing money without the intention to repay, despite such intention, constitutes the subjective element of intent to defraud, which is essential for the crime of fraud.

nodes.label: D_15
nodes.text: The defendant, having met the victim F through a part-time job around February 21, 2021, falsely claimed to be in urgent need of money due to a traffic accident, asking to borrow money with the promise of repayment upon receiving their salary the day after tomorrow. However, in reality, the defendant had not been involved in any traffic accident, had no salary to receive, and intended to use the borrowed money to repay debts to another person. Therefore, the defendant had neither the intention nor the ability to repay the borrowed money to the victim within a short period.

nodes.label: C_16
nodes.text: The defendant transferring a portion of the amount borrowed from the victim to a third party for urgent living expenses and repayment of existing debts proves the absence of the intent to embezzle, which is a subjective element of the crime of fraud.

nodes.label: W_16
nodes.text: The transfer of a portion of the borrowed money in an urgent economic situation demonstrates that not all amounts were used for the defendant's personal benefit, which supports the absence of an intent to embezzle on the part of the defendant.

nodes.label: D_16
nodes.text: As a salaried employee receiving regular wages, it is emphasized that there was the intention and ability to repay the borrowed money, and some of the amount was transferred to a third party, indicating that not all of the borrowed money was used for the defendant's benefit.

nodes.label: C_17
nodes.text: The fact that the defendant received a salary proves that the defendant had the intention and ability to repay, and this refutes the claim that there was no intention to repay the money borrowed from the victim at the time of borrowing.

nodes.label: W_17
nodes.text: Employees with a regular salary income can be presumed to have the ability to repay, and this reinforces that the defendant's purpose in borrowing money was for the repayment of existing debts and emergency living expenses.

nodes.label: D_17
nodes.text: The defendant emphasizes that, as a salaried worker receiving regular wages, they had the intention and ability to repay the borrowed money.

nodes.label: C_18
nodes.text: The fact that the defendant used the funds borrowed from the victim for urgent living expenses and to repay existing debts suggests that there was no intent to defraud.

nodes.label: W_18
nodes.text: Raising funds for livelihood and repayment of existing debts demonstrates that the defendant did not have a subjective intent to commit fraud, indicating that the defendant was simply in financial difficulty and urgently needed funds.

nodes.label: D_18
nodes.text: The defendant's actions were for urgent living expenses and repayment of existing debts, and there was no intent to defraud, which is a subjective element of fraud.
